ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Keyboard bindings info.
ygData.msgSnippet: Casting the spells from the spell gems by using the keyboard (instead of moving the gems to the hotkeys, you can use ALT-1 to cast the spell in the first spell
ygData.messageBody:
Casting the spells from the spell gems by using the keyboard (instead of moving the gems to the hotkeys, you can use ALT-1 to cast the spell in the first spell slot...all the way through ALT-8). It used to not work for bards, and when you used it, it also tried actiivating the item/social/spell in that number hotkey...both problems are fixed now : )

--Khelan

>>> <JESSICA_WEBBER@...> 11/16/00 10:19AM >>>


Thanks a million Khelen. One question though.

>2) ALT-casting now works for Bards

What's ALT-casting?

Peace
Evulia of Tunare
